synopsis: A porn star is hired by a dashing intelligence officer as a 'honey-trap' for a dreaded assassin. She not only has to confront her bitter-sweet past, but is also forced to make an impossible choice - one that will put her own life in jeopardy.
tagline: To love her is to die.
casting: ['Randeep Hooda', 'Arunoday Singh', 'Sunny Leone', 'Arif Zakaria', 'Sumit Nijhawan', 'Imran Zahid']

synopsis: A man imagines that everybody he sees is naked. That's... that's really about it.
tagline: Millions spent for actors, setting and story! Not a penny for costumes!
casting: ['Billy Falbo', 'Lawrence J. Aberwood', 'William Kerwin', 'Kay Montie', 'Linda Cotton', "Pat O'Farrell", 'Dorothy Holbrook', 'Toni Carroll', 'Ginger Hale', 'Gail Jordan']

synopsis: After breaking up with his longtime stage partner, a famous but jaded Vegas magician fights for relevance when a new, "hip" street magician appears on the scene.

synopsis: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco when he is forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when an ancient alpha predator arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake, as they make their way toward their final battleground: San Francisco.
